children.desc: Vengeance Demon Hunter is entering Season 2 in a much better spot compared to the previous season. One of the biggest changes is the buff to the durability toolkit of the spec, allowing you to have less "kiting" tanking than before. The spec still possesses one of the best mob controls across any tanking spec in Mythic+, which will turn valuable for any team looking for a tank. One of their biggest advantages is having one of the highest damage profiles across all tank specs (even after the bug fixes), extremely high self-sustain and great mob-control, which are the mains reason why we believe their current performance warrants S-tier.
children.descZH: 复仇恶魔猎手相比上个赛季，在第二季中将处于一个更好的位置。最大的变化之一是增强了专精的耐久度工具包，使得你需要的“风筝”式坦克操作比以前更少。该专精在M+中仍拥有所有坦克专精中最出色的怪物控制能力之一，这对于任何寻找坦克的队伍来说都将是宝贵的。他们最大的优势之一是拥有所有坦克专精中最高的伤害输出之一（即使在修复漏洞后），还拥有极高的自我恢复能力和出色的怪物控制能力，这也是我们认为他们当前的表现值得S级的主要原因。

children.desc: Protection Paladin is looking yet again incredibly strong, with them already being one of the most durable tanks on PTR, they will also retain their signature overpowered utility. Although the recent nerfs will lower their durability and DPS numbers, they will still have one of the highest outputs across all tanks. In addition, they have incredible mob control which is another reason why the spec is so highly desired. Overall, they are currently ranked as one of the better tank entering Season 2.
children.descZH: 防护圣骑士再次显得无比强大，他们在PTR上已经是耐久度最高的坦克之一，并且还将保留他们标志性的强大功能性。尽管最近的削弱会降低他们的耐久度和DPS数值，但他们仍将拥有所有坦克中最高的输出之一。此外，他们还拥有出色的怪物控制能力，这也是该专精备受追捧的另一个原因。总的来说，他们目前被列为进入第二季的最佳坦克之一。

children.desc: Unfortunately, for Blood Death Knight there are not a lot of changes leading to the Season 2 of Mythic+. They are getting a new tier set supported by a hefty amount of RNG and arguably worse than what the Season 1 set had to offer. In addition, defensively and offensively are at a disadvantage compared to the top-ranked tanks, further pushing them down the list. Overall, it is still early to have a final estimate of how the spec will rank. Still, preliminary thoughts are that the spec performance is much better on the lower level keys (the main factory is the highest self-sustain) compared to the higher level ones, where you might struggle when tanking several packs together.
children.descZH: 不幸的是，鲜血死亡骑士在迈向M+第二季的过程中并没有太多的改动。他们将获得一套新的套装，这套装备由大量的随机元素支持，而且可以说比第一季的套装更差。此外，与排名靠前的坦克相比，他们在防御和进攻方面都处于劣势，这进一步导致他们的排名下降。总的来说，现在对专精的最终排名进行预测还为时过早。不过，初步的看法是，与高级钥匙相比，该专精在低级钥匙中的表现要好得多（主要原因是拥有最高的自我恢复能力），而在高级钥匙中，当你同时坦克多个怪物群时可能会遇到困难。

children.desc: Protection Warrior has a ton of attention leading to the next season, primarily changing the spell priority and the focus of the class rotation (with the bread-and-butter basics staying the same). Luckily, the compensation buffs that came, (% flat damage adjustments, stronger [无视苦痛], and better self-sustain thanks to more Rage) which makes up for all the other nerfs. In addition, a new recent build has been discovered, making their single-target and AoE damage their strongest asset, which immensely improves their performance. Although, it has been confirmed that a small portion of that is due to unintentional buff that should have only affected Arms warriors ( [Demolish]) and is soon likely to be hotfixed (which will result in a minor damage loss). In addition, the spec will continue to have durability troubles at time (especially against continuous magical damage), which may require more healer attention than other tanks.
children.descZH: 防护战士在即将到来的赛季中备受关注，主要是改变了法术优先级和职业循环的重点（虽然基础的核心技能保持不变）。幸运的是，随之而来的补偿增强（包括百分比平伤调整、更强大的[无视苦痛]以及由于获得更多的怒气而带来的更好的自我恢复能力）弥补了所有其他的削弱。此外，最近发现了一个新的构建，使得他们的单体和范围伤害成为他们最强大的优势，这极大地提高了他们的性能。不过，已经证实其中一小部分是由于一个无意中的增强，这个增强本应只影响武器战士（[拆除]），并且很快可能会被热修复（这将导致少量的伤害损失）。此外，该专精有时仍会遇到耐久度问题（特别是面对持续的魔法伤害时），这可能需要治疗者给予比其他坦克更多的关注。

children.desc: Guardian Druid received a complete shuffle on the general talent tree, which will positively impact them. They have introduced some new cool talents (like Symbiotic Relationship and further increased their damage performance. Although their damage profile appears to be just fine (depending on the talent choices), durability is still an issue for the spec as it fails to compete against the higher-rated tanks at this stage of PTR.
children.descZH: 守护德鲁伊在通用天赋树上进行了彻底的调整，这将对他们产生积极的影响。他们引入了一些新的酷炫天赋（如共生关系），并进一步提高了他们的伤害表现。尽管他们的伤害属性看起来还不错（取决于天赋选择），但耐久度仍然是该专精的一个问题，因为在PTR的这个阶段，他们无法与评级更高的坦克竞争。

children.desc: Unfortunately for Brewmaster Monk, received no major changes leading up to Season 2. Their performance is currently better than what it was in Season 1 as the durability aspect of the spec has been improved. But, usual issues yet remain to be solved: not enough self-sustain, which often relies on much more "babysitting" from your healer. On top of this, they are one of the most difficult tanks to master, further pushing the barrier of entry higher and higher (especially with that many buttons in your rotation). We expect further tuning to hit PTR and hopefully, we can revisit the rankings.
children.descZH: 不幸的是，酒仙武僧在迈向第二季的过程中并没有获得重大的改动。他们目前的表现比第一季要好，因为该专精的耐久度已经得到了改善。但是，仍然存在一些需要解决的问题：自我恢复能力不足，这通常需要治疗者给予更多的“照顾”。除此之外，他们还是最难掌握的坦克之一，这使得入门门槛越来越高（尤其是你的循环中有那么多的技能按钮）。我们预计PTR将进行进一步的调整，希望届时我们能重新评估排名。
